data.message: Great that this will increase the number of people that can have access to Facebook! So important for people to be able to connect.

replies.message: We think so too, Joan! Thanks for the kind words. -Ali
Looking forward to the even less intelligent masses joining conversations about complicated social, political, economic, and enviromental issues.
Chad Gainor, it won't be much different, hell I've been on here for a long time.
As well as more intelligent people. This is one of the few positive things happening now that could really be life changing for alot of people. Don't be negative.
Group intellect grows when we openly share knowledge.
Life changing! Cheers!💥💥💥

Mike Alexander you are right. 
Good groups and bad

Facebook it still ain't got  nothing on nanobugged. in fact why not just use naobugged technology (described in book) to send 0 and 1 signals on a nano-hretz freq. to naobuggs in the area that send ....never mind cause what if some one was to eat the nanobuggs and they would then be a wi-fi and that could lead to all kinda stuff. But the CIA is doing it in some other way I know for a fact so it would work.

Interesting replies.. You're right, I shouldn't be so negative.. though, I have been on here for a long time, and I've seen things gradually trend down to where they're at now.. Adding more people to that mix is great for them, because they'll get access to all of that info, but bad for us, because we already have to deal with enough ignorance now.. Idk, this doesn't affect me, I'll be offline by then, do what you want.
Great! See ya!
Facebook I have sent a pm. Maybe that doesn't work on this site? Where can I contact Facebook to find out what happened to disappearing posts?
Marianne those posts were probably deleted for some reason.
Facebook Why should only Americans waste half their time on Facebook?  The rest of humanity must waste its time too!

Our voices are the most powerful tool/weapon of the people. Easy to call people uneducated when the truth is we are all ignorant. Remember, judge not lest you be judged because you will be judged based on how you judge others. Simply put, you're ignorant if you call others stupid.
